text: Sum tame dhongi'one na joya? Te potana grathavala inkari bha'i'one kahe che jo tame desanikala karavamam avya to jarurathi ame pana tamari sathe nikali ja'isum ane tamara vise ame kayareya ko'ini pana vata nahi mani'e ane jo tamarathi lada'i karavamam avase to jarurathi ame tamari madada karisu parantu allaha ta'ala saksi ape che ke a taddana jutha che
